summary: An ordinance providing for the improvement of 42nd Ave. South from Holly Street to Othello Street; and certain other streets and avenues; by constructing watermains and otherwise improving the same, all in accordance with Resolution No. 18210 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing that payment for said improvement be made by special assessments upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment by Bonds."
